member.name: DWRITE_CARET_METRICS
member.summary: The DWRITE_CARET_METRICS structure specifies the metrics for caret placement in a font.

member.name: DWRITE_CARET_METRICS.slopeRise
member.summary: Vertical rise of the caret in font design units. Rise / Run yields the caret angle. Rise = 1 for perfectly upright fonts (non-italic).

member.name: DWRITE_CARET_METRICS.slopeRun
member.summary: Horizontal run of the caret in font design units. Rise / Run yields the caret angle. Run = 0 for perfectly upright fonts (non-italic).

member.name: DWRITE_CARET_METRICS.offset
member.summary: Horizontal offset of the caret, in font design units, along the baseline for good appearance. Offset = 0 for perfectly upright fonts (non-italic).
